channel.title: CVE Feed for Simple Behance Portfolio -- all

item.title: CVE-2021-34649|2024-08-04T00:19:47.751Z -- simple%20behance%20portfolio -- simple%20behance%20portfolio
item.description: The Simple Behance Portfolio WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the `dark` parameter in the ~/titan-framework/iframe-font-preview.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 0.2.
